Articles.Content: I use Tantares. Easy.
I like squirrels
Next poster, I use the AerosBike!

I like turtles?

*throws magical turtle*

Does nothing. A really magical turtle will dodge itself.

(Casts the spell of laziness on the next poster.)
I use TM33 Reflect.
Next poster, I use Wait!
I summon a level 100 Froakie! It uses water gun! It’s Super Effective.
I use Comeback!

I use banana!

To, like, make you slip....

Hm

Might need to work on my strategy...
I use Meme!
I use Antimeme!
Next poster, I use Mech!

cannon loaded with N-Stoff this stuff is such a strong oxidizer, it even makes ashes burn again. Even The N A Z I S (W T F [you can't even write that], why can't you write that word?) weren't crazy enough to use it in warfare.

Edited February 20, 2018 by Human Person
@TheKSPBeginner, to recognize your invaluable work, I'd like to give you a knife to the back.

i had this
KV-2 Mk. 2 Block 2 Ausf. B Bis

I use Anti-Tank Shell!

(This is starting to turn into Survive YOU! for me)

11 minutes ago, TheKSPBeginner said:

(This is starting to turn into Survive YOU! for me)

Dang, he figured it out

On 2/21/2018 at 7:30 AM, TheKSPBeginner said:

I use Anti-Tank Shell!

(This is starting to turn into Survive YOU! for me)

I use anti-anti-tank shell!

No more shells.

Spoiler

The anti-anti-tank is approaching to you anti-destroyed.
I use a flamethrower. But not the cheap kind most people have. It's a big one. Really big.
I use my 12.8 CM Pak 44 Cannon, mounted on the body of an M46 Pershing. It looks rediculous but Nothing Survives a 128 millimeter cannon loaded with HEAT shells.
